TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ValidationPropertyAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ValidationPropertyAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ValidationPropertyAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 定义 ASP.NET 服务器控件用于标识验证属性的元数据特性。

span.span: Defines the metadata attribute that ASP.NET server controls use to identify a validation property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性通常用于基于窗体的输入控件。This attribute is typically used for form-based input controls. 有关属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](/dotnet/standard/attributes/)。For more information about attributes, see [Attributes](/dotnet/standard/attributes/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了 在创建自定义控件时使用类。The following code example demonstrates using the class when creating a custom control. [!code-csharp[ValidationPropertyAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ValidationPropertyAttribute/CS/validationpropertyattribute1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ValidationPropertyAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ValidationPropertyAttribute/VB/validationpropertyattribute1.vb#1)]
